mapper.select: SELECT p.pno pno, p.bno, p.mno, postcont, postdate, isshow, count(l.pno) cnt, ischeck FROM poststab p, liketab l WHERE p.pno = l.pno(+) AND isshow = 'Y' GROUP BY p.pno, postcont, postdate, p.bno, p.mno, isshow, ischeck ORDER BY postdate DESC

SELECT pt.pno, mt.id, lt.ischeck, bname, gname, postcont, largeimg, postdate pdate, postdate ptime FROM poststab pt, booktab bt, genretab gt, (SELECT DISTINCT mno, id FROM membertab, fallowtab WHERE (fallower_no = (SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = #{id}) AND mno = fallow_no AND ischeck = 'Y') OR mno = (SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = #{id}) ) mt, (SELECT pno, ischeck FROM liketab WHERE mno = (SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = #{id})) lt WHERE pt.mno = mt.mno AND pt.isshow = 'Y' AND pt.bno = bt.bno AND bt.genre = gt.genre AND pt.pno = lt.pno(+) ORDER BY postdate DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, often.cnt, often.bno, bname, gname FROM (SELECT count(p.bno) cnt, p.bno FROM poststab p, booktab b WHERE p.bno = b.bno AND p.isshow = 'Y' GROUP BY p.bno) often, booktab b, genretab g WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND b.bno = often.bno AND b.genre = g.genre ORDER BY cnt DESC
